page.title: 07SCHOOLS
page.content: There are 3 schools in our area; Craigton Primary School,Douglas Academy and Atholl Preparatory School. {Craigton Primary School}dates back to at least 1870.It is a rural school about 3km from the centre of Milngavie.Although there are 2 classrooms there are only 8 children in it and 1 teacher. { Douglas Academy }opened in 1967. The school was built on the site of an old house belonging to the Douglas family and the grounds around the school were once part of the Douglas Mains Estate.There can be as many as 1000 secondary pupils in the school and at the moment 68 teachers. {Atholl Preparatory School }was opened in 1925.There are 68 pupils in 5 classes ranging from 3 to 9 years. The school started in a small cottage called Atholl Cottage, hence the name.
